snippet.title: The Thrill of the Fight 2 | Early Access Launch Trailer | Halfbrick
snippet.description:
Now available in Early Access. The undisputed champion of VR boxing games returns with a stunning, fully-reimagined sequel to the original breakout hit! 
 
Play against friends or rise through the ranks in skill-based matchmaking. The best VR boxing game ever made - Thrill of the Fight 2 is the closest you can get to actually stepping into the ring!
 
The Thrill of the Fight 2 is now available for Multiplayer for Early Access, with more features coming soon! Glove up your fully customizable avatar and test your skill while working up a sweat in the new online player versus player mode. Challenge friends or enter the arena through skill-based matchmaking. You never know who's going to show - jab, dodge, and sweat your way to the top of the boxing world! Grab your gloves, step through the ropes, and defend your title!
 
Buy now: meta.com/experiences/quest/5479643155418422/
Web: thethrillofthefight2.com
Discord: discord.gg/TheThrillOfTheFight2
Facebook: facebook.com/thethrillofthefight2
Instagram: instagram.com/thethrillofthefight2
X: https://x.com/Halfbrick
